name: Follow me (RU)
description:
You'll experience a dark, mysterious text quest about a young man.

It's a relatively short story, it can be finished in about an hour and a half.

========

The Elders forbade to come near the castle a long time ago. Locals from a small village located in the forest keep away from it.

There are lots of rumours about the castle. People say horrible monsters dwell there, and you can hear screams of their victims at night. The brave who dare to come closer vanish into thin air.

This is a ru-version of the story that's presented in my app on Google Play.

Unfortunately, due to Ink version there're no possibility to save progress.
